7#ifndef PKSAV_GBA_RIBBONS_H
8#define PKSAV_GBA_RIBBONS_H
9
17enum pksav_gba_contest_ribbon_level
18{
20 PKSAV_GBA_CONTEST_RIBBON_NONE = 0,
22 PKSAV_GBA_CONTEST_RIBBON_NORMAL = 1,
24 PKSAV_GBA_CONTEST_RIBBON_SUPER = 2,
26 PKSAV_GBA_CONTEST_RIBBON_HYPER = 3,
28 PKSAV_GBA_CONTEST_RIBBON_MASTER = 4
29};
30
34enum pksav_gba_contest_ribbons_offset
35{
37 PKSAV_GBA_COOL_RIBBONS_OFFSET = 0,
39 PKSAV_GBA_BEAUTY_RIBBONS_OFFSET = 3,
41 PKSAV_GBA_CUTE_RIBBONS_OFFSET = 6,
43 PKSAV_GBA_SMART_RIBBONS_OFFSET = 9,
45 PKSAV_GBA_TOUGH_RIBBONS_OFFSET = 12,
46};
47
48enum pksav_gba_contest_ribbons_mask
49{
51 PKSAV_GBA_COOL_RIBBONS_MASK = (7 << PKSAV_GBA_COOL_RIBBONS_OFFSET),
53 PKSAV_GBA_BEAUTY_RIBBONS_MASK = (7 << PKSAV_GBA_BEAUTY_RIBBONS_OFFSET),
55 PKSAV_GBA_CUTE_RIBBONS_MASK = (7 << PKSAV_GBA_CUTE_RIBBONS_OFFSET),
57 PKSAV_GBA_SMART_RIBBONS_MASK = (7 << PKSAV_GBA_SMART_RIBBONS_OFFSET),
59 PKSAV_GBA_TOUGH_RIBBONS_MASK = (7 << PKSAV_GBA_TOUGH_RIBBONS_OFFSET)
60};
61
62#define PKSAV_GBA_COOL_CONTEST_LEVEL(field) \
63 (((field) & PKSAV_GBA_COOL_RIBBONS_MASK) >> PKSAV_GBA_COOL_RIBBONS_OFFSET)
64
65#define PKSAV_GBA_BEAUTY_CONTEST_LEVEL(field) \
66 (((field) & PKSAV_GBA_BEAUTY_RIBBONS_MASK) >> PKSAV_GBA_BEAUTY_RIBBONS_OFFSET)
67
68#define PKSAV_GBA_CUTE_CONTEST_LEVEL(field) \
69 (((field) & PKSAV_GBA_CUTE_RIBBONS_MASK) >> PKSAV_GBA_CUTE_RIBBONS_OFFSET)
70
71#define PKSAV_GBA_SMART_CONTEST_LEVEL(field) \
72 (((field) & PKSAV_GBA_SMART_RIBBONS_MASK) >> PKSAV_GBA_SMART_RIBBONS_OFFSET)
73
74#define PKSAV_GBA_TOUGH_CONTEST_LEVEL(field) \
75 (((field) & PKSAV_GBA_TOUGH_RIBBONS_MASK) >> PKSAV_GBA_TOUGH_RIBBONS_OFFSET)
76
77enum pksav_gba_ribbon_mask
78{
80 PKSAV_GBA_CHAMPION_RIBBON_MASK = (1 << 15),
82 PKSAV_GBA_WINNING_RIBBON_MASK = (1 << 16),
84 PKSAV_GBA_VICTORY_RIBBON_MASK = (1 << 17),
86 PKSAV_GBA_ARTIST_RIBBON_MASK = (1 << 18),
88 PKSAV_GBA_EFFORT_RIBBON_MASK = (1 << 19),
90 PKSAV_GBA_MARINE_RIBBON_MASK = (1 << 20),
92 PKSAV_GBA_LAND_RIBBON_MASK = (1 << 21),
94 PKSAV_GBA_SKY_RIBBON_MASK = (1 << 22),
96 PKSAV_GBA_COUNTRY_RIBBON_MASK = (1 << 23),
98 PKSAV_GBA_NATIONAL_RIBBON_MASK = (1 << 24),
100 PKSAV_GBA_EARTH_RIBBON_MASK = (1 << 25),
102 PKSAV_GBA_WORLD_RIBBON_MASK = (1 << 26)
103};
104
105#endif /* PKSAV_GBA_RIBBONS_H */
